sentences.en: Amy slipped downstairs and out of the house.
sentences.cn: 埃米偷偷下楼溜出了房子。

sentences.en: Charles was downstairs in the kitchen.
Denise went downstairs and made some tea.
Everybody was downstairs watching a movie.

sentences.cn: 他以极危险的速度猛冲下楼。

sentences.en: He was in an argument with his landlord downstairs.
sentences.cn: 他与楼下的房东发生了争执。

sentences.en: I could hear Jonathan acting up downstairs.
sentences.cn: 我能听见乔纳森在楼下撒泼。

sentences.en: Rosie ran downstairs to answer the door.
She can still come downstairs with assistance but she's very weak.
sentences.cn: 在有人搀扶的情况下她还是能够下楼的，但是很虚弱。

sentences.en: She repainted the downstairs rooms and closed off the second floor.
sentences.cn: 她重新粉刷了楼下的房间，并把二楼封上了。

sentences.en: She said his friends could sleep over in the big room downstairs.
sentences.cn: 她说他的朋友们可以在楼下的大房间里住一晚。

sentences.en: Sounds of voices and commotion could be heard downstairs now.
sentences.cn: 现在能听见楼下人声鼎沸。

sentences.en: The Chief summoned me downstairs. He was brisk and businesslike.
sentences.cn: 主管叫我到楼下。他做事干练、务实。

sentences.en: The downstairs of the two little houses had been entirely refashioned.
sentences.cn: 两栋小楼的底层已经彻底翻修过。

sentences.en: The telephone was downstairs in the entrance hall.

trans.tran_en: Downstairs means situated on the ground floor of a building or on a lower floor than you are

trans.tran_cn: 往楼下，顺楼梯而下，在楼下
trans.tran_en: towards or on a lower floor of a building, especially a house
the rooms on the ground floor in a house
